doc:
Herman Timberg https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herman_Timberg 0 Herman Timberg (April 18, 1891 – April 16, 1952) was a vaudevillian, actor and songwriter, a writer of sketches and dialogue for vaudeville and musicals, "active in nearly every field of show business." He was the brother of composer Sammy Timberg and uncle of the journalist Robert Timberg. Herman_Timberg ( April_18_,_1891 – April_16_,_1952 ) was a_vaudevillian_,_actor_and_songwriter , a_writer of sketches and dialogue for vaudeville_and_musicals , " active in nearly_every_field of show_business . " He was the_brother of composer_Sammy_Timberg and uncle of the_journalist_Robert_Timberg .
